title: Kendrick Bourne on electrical substation injury theory: "I kind of buy it"

sources.name: Pro Football Talk
sources.title: Kendrick Bourne on electrical substation injury theory: "I kind of buy it"
sources.description: The notion that the 49ers' uptick in injuries flows from the proximity of an electrical substation to their practice facility — as nonsensical as it seems — continues to mushroom.
